docblock.description: This class is use to initilise the processes and connections that will be needed on an initial page load. Processes will also be stoped at the end of a page load using the functions in this class.

This function is the initial call that is will begin any processes and will create connections that will be required for a page to be created. Nothing is passed to this function and nothing is returned.
This function is used to close connections and stop any processes running in the background. Nothing is passed to this function and nothing is returned.
This function is used to check that the site has been set up. If the setup is correct then the application will function as expected. If not, the application will behave differently.
This function takes any errors, processes them and will cause the application to react as required.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The filename where the error is thrown.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The line number where the error is.

docblock.description: This function is used to get the relevent function to log the error with. The error code is passed and before the log method to be used is passed back as a string.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The PHP error code for the error that has been thrown

tag.name: return
tag.description: The function to log the error with

docblock.description: This function gets the error type as a string so that it can be displayed in the logs. The error code is passed and before the type is passed back as a string.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The PHP error code for the error that has been thrown

tag.name: return
tag.description: The error type as a string

docblock.description: This is the interface that MUST be implemented in each and all of the different components that are implemented across the full CMS.
This function is called to get a textual representation of the compnent. Nothing is passed to the function and a string representing the element is returned.

This function is called to convert the element to HTML so that it can be outout on a web page. Nothing is passed to this function as it uses the elements array to render the HTML. This HTML is then returned.
This function uses the content set in the class to check for embedded elements.
docblock.long-description: Nothing is returned and nothing is passed to the function.

docblock.long-description: Nothing is passed and the ID of the component is returned.

This function is used to get the attributes held within the component class. Nothing is passed and the array of attributes are returned.
This function is used to reset the ID of the component. The new ID is passed to the function and that is then returned.
This function is used to reset the elements of the component. The new elements are passed to the function and these are then returned.
This function is used to reset the content of the component. The new content is passed to the function and that is then returned.
This function is used to reset the elements of the component. The new elements are passed to the function and these are then returned.
This function is used to add a new element to the elements array. The new element is passed and the full array is returned.
This function is used to add a new attribute to the attributes array. The new attribute is passed and the full array is returned.

docblock.description: This function outputs the fully rendered HTML page.

This function gets the data related to the page. This is then used to build up the data array for everything that is to be input into the page. On render, all the data that has been prepared is output into the page.
This function is used to build up all the page header data. This includes all the meta data, as well as other fundamentals such as language and favicon.
This function is used to render the page header into HTML. It is then passed into the data array where it can be inserted into the page as HTML.
This function is used to render the page content into HTML. It is then passed into the data array where it can be inserted into the page as HTML.
This function is used to render the page footer into HTML. It is then passed into the data array where it can be inserted into the page as HTML.
This function is used to parce the content of the page. The content is parsed as a string before being converted into HTML and returned as a HTML string.
